NutritionalFactSchemaTexts.totalGrams: Totals of fat, carbohydrates, protein and salt must add to 100 but is

fat.positive: Fat must be a positive number
fat.nonnegative: Fat must be a positive number
fat.max: Fat must be less or equal to 100

saturatedFat.positive: Saturated fat must be a positive number
saturatedFat.nonnegative: Saturated fat must be a positive number
saturatedFat.max: Saturated fat must be less than fat and less or equal to 100

carbohydrates.positive: Carbohydrates must be a positive number
carbohydrates.nonnegative: Carbohydrates must be a positive number
carbohydrates.max: Carbohydrates must be less or equal to 100

sugar.positive: Sugar must be a positive number
sugar.nonnegative: Sugar must be a positive number
sugar.max: Sugar must be less than carbohydrates and less or equal to 100

protein.positive: Protein must be a positive number
protein.nonnegative: Protein must be a positive number
protein.max: Protein must be less or equal to 100

salt.positive: Salt must be a positive number
salt.nonnegative: Salt must be a positive number
salt.max: Salt must be less or equal to 100

NutritionalFactSchemaTexts.refineSaturatedFat: Saturated fat must be less than fat
NutritionalFactSchemaTexts.refineSugar: Sugar must be less than carbohydrates

RecipeSchemaTexts.minIngredients: At least one ingredient is required

PlanSchemaTexts.minRecipes: At least one recipe is required

HomeHeaderTexts.title: Your path to a healthier life starts here !

register.title: Register
register.description: Register to get access to all the features of our platform, and become a part of our community.

posts.title: Read Posts
posts.description: Read posts to gain knowledge and insights about different topics written by professionals.

plans.title: Buy Plans
plans.description: Buy plans to improve yourself and get the full experience of our platform. We offer a wide range of plans according to your needs.

be-aware.title: Be aware
be-aware.text: Realize your problems and target them. Don't be afraid to make changes that make you uncomfortable.

be-afraid.title: Get comfortable with being afraid
be-afraid.text: It's normal to feel overwhelmed and insecure about getting started. Don't let these feelings stop you.

make-a-plan.title: Make a plan
make-a-plan.text: Plan ahead and be very structured. Make realistic targets and do things your way. Don't let others decide your journey.

step-by-step.title: Step by step
step-by-step.text: Be patient and know that life is a marathon, not a sprint. Don't seek quick fixes; be happy with every little progress.

work-hard.title: Work your ass off
work-hard.text: Working hard pays off. Every change requires sacrifices, so be prepared to make some. In the end, you'll thank yourself.

comfortable.title: Become comfortable with your new life
comfortable.text: Over time, everything you thought was too hard will become trivial. When this happens, pat yourself on the back and see your progress.

stay-consistent.title: Don't let the results slow you down
stay-consistent.text: Don't get too comfortable and think you can't lose what you've achieved. This is where the difference between the sprint and the marathon is made.

FooterTexts.title: Your path to a healthier life starts here
FooterTexts.rightsReserved: Bro Meets Science Co. All rights reserved.
